participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, Emily is passionate about helping others. She enjoys sharing her journey and inspiring those around her.
participant_1.background: i am a cancer survivor. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Jake thrives in nature and loves to explore new heights. He is friendly and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_2.background: i have a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.
